com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted.journaling

Interface JournalingPersistentStoreIndexer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJournalingPersistentStoreIndexer

    public interface JournalingPersistentStoreIndexer
    An instance of this interface serves as an external indexer to an ExternallyIndexedJournalingPersistentStore.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the index.
      void forEach(ProcedureZeroOfLong procedure)
      Iterates over the journal offsets managed by this indexer.
      void index(IByteArrayStore.WriteRequest writeRequest, long offset)
      Updates the index with the given value and offset.
      long size() 

    • Method Detail

      • forEach

        void forEach(ProcedureZeroOfLong procedure)
        Iterates over the journal offsets managed by this indexer. Each offset is the offset in the journal of a write request containing a value.
        Parameters:
        procedure - the iteration procedure to use

      • size

        long size()
        Returns:
        the number of elements container by the store

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the index. Used by the store to notify the indexer that a full scan of the journal is about to be performed.

      • index

        void index(IByteArrayStore.WriteRequest writeRequest,
           long offset)
        Updates the index with the given value and offset. This method is called by the store when scanning its journal or applying replicated write requests.
        Parameters:
        writeRequest - the write request read from the journal when scanning
        offset - the write request's offset in the journal
